website_summaries.verdict: Adorable button-up two-piece jammies for families who love to incorporate Charlie Brown into their holiday traditions. (Infant pajama is a footed onesie.)
pros: Sentimental design appeals to adults and children alike
Cozy, festive flannel with fun print
cons: Though adult version is made of cotton flannel, child version is made of polyester flannel

customer_reviews.title: High quality, well-made, comfortable pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I bought them from my daughter, son-in-law, and their two kids. They are thick and very well made.They all fit perfectly and are so comfortable. It seems they can’t wait to change into them! I used to order directly from patjamagram.com but am glad to get it from amazon prime for the first time this year!
customer_reviews.author: kkg17

customer_reviews.title: Not the washing result I expected
customer_reviews.text: While right out of the package, the color and quality looks nice, but after washing them, I noticed peeling and fading. I was so excited to be trying out this well known brand for the first time. Then was soooo disappointed in PajamaGram since the expense of these for a family is so much and now they just look terrible. Didn't even get to wear them once yet since I washed them straight out the package. Also, for my family, they did not seem to run large like other reviewers mentioned.

product_meta.title: PajamaGram Family Christmas Pajamas Soft - Christmas Pajamas for Family, Green
feature_bullets: ROOMY FIT - Our PJs are designed to be relaxed & generously oversized. You may find they RUN LARGE. We recommend if you are between sizes, you SIZE DOWN one size smaller. See size chart below.
HAPPY HOLIDAY PAJAMA SETS - Fun and festive two-piece pajama sets feature a colorful print of the entire Charlie Brown gang trimming the tree and decking the halls
STYLES FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY - Available in sizes for adults, boys, girls, toddlers, infants, and dogs, they're the best pajamas to make for a picture-perfect matching look for the holidays and beyond
SOFT, HIGH-QUALITY FABRIC - Adult PJs are made of a super-soft, double-brushed cotton flannel; Kid and Dog PJs are made of cozy soft polyester flannel
A GREAT VALUE - Order multiple pairs of matching pajamas for the whole family from PajamaGram and you'll pay a single, low-cost shipping price for all your pairs
Flame Resistant Kids' Styles - For child's safety, children's sleepwear should be snug-fitting or flame resistant; these garments are flame resistant
